alert.note: Alert for Fillmore; Olmsted; Winona (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 30 at 3:57PM CDT by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Winona, southeastern Olmsted and north central Fillmore Counties through 430 PM CDT... At 357 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Chatfield, or 10 miles north of Preston, moving north at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... St. Charles and Dover around 415 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Saratoga, Highway 30 And County 74, Utica, County Roads 9 And 10, Pilot Mound and Troy. This includes Interstate 90 in Minnesota between mile markers 229 and 238. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
